title: What is Cava's (NYSE: CAVA) adjusted EBIT and EBITDA for the fiscal year ending in 2023? Make sure to factor operating and variable lease related line items. Use ratios to approximate any lease related line items that are not explicitly reported. Show answer in millions and with no decimal point precision.
description:
1) Identify fiscal year and sources: CAVA’s fiscal year ended December 31, 2023; use FY2023 earnings press release and FY2023 Form 10-K to source Adjusted EBITDA, depreciation and amortization (D&A), and lease-cost components.
 
 2) Record FY2023 Adjusted EBITDA: $73,825 thousand ($73.825 million).
 
 3) Record FY2023 depreciation and amortization: $47,433 thousand ($47.433 million).
 
 4) Verify operating and variable lease costs are included in operating results: FY2023 operating lease cost $44,201 thousand and variable lease cost $1,421 thousand (classified within occupancy and G&A), plus pre-opening lease cost $4,296 thousand (within pre-opening costs); these are not added back in CAVA’s Adjusted EBITDA definition, so EBIT/EBITDA figures already reflect them—no ratio approximations required.
 
 5) Compute FY2023 Adjusted EBIT by subtracting D&A from Adjusted EBITDA: $73,825 thousand − $47,433 thousand = $26,392 thousand.
 
 6) Present FY2023 results in USD millions, no decimals (rounded): Adjusted EBIT = $26 million; Adjusted EBITDA = $74 million.
answer:
Adjusted EBIT = "$26 million" 
 Adjusted EBITDA = "$74 million"

rubric.criteria: Fiscal year identified as ended December 31, 2023 and sources cited as FY2023 earnings press release and FY2023 Form 10-K
Adjusted EBITDA reported as $73,825 thousand ($73.825 million)
Depreciation and amortization reported as $47,433 thousand ($47.433 million)
Operating lease cost reported as $44,201 thousand
Variable lease cost reported as $1,421 thousand
Pre-opening lease cost reported as $4,296 thousand
Answer states lease-related costs are not added back in CAVA’s Adjusted EBITDA definition and therefore no ratio approximations are required
Computed Adjusted EBIT equals $26,392 thousand (Adjusted EBITDA minus D&A)
Final Adjusted EBIT presented as $26 million in USD millions with no decimal precision
Final Adjusted EBITDA presented as $74 million in USD millions with no decimal precision
